metadata.Title: CVE-2023-6185 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description:
Improper input validation enabling arbitrary Gstreamer pipeline injection

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-6185` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

fonts-opensymbol - 4:102.12+LibO7.6.4-0ubuntu0.23.10.1
